document.full_text: thousands of people thronged apple stores on both u.s. coasts as the ipad 2 went on sale friday, signaling strong appetite for a device that dominates the fledgling market it created.
document.title: big crowds greet apple's ipad 2 in new york
lines_and_colors: thousands of people thronged apple stores on both u.s. coasts as the ipad 2 went on sale friday, signaling strong appetite for a device that dominates the fledgling market it created.
